DOC.brief_summary: Healthy premenopausal woman iron-deficient without anemia receive low-dose iron dietary supplement . The investigator seek determine low-dose iron dietary supplement restore iron level normal range few side effect typically experience high dos iron supplementation .
DOC.brief_title: Low-dose Iron Supplementation Markers Iron Status Among Non-anemic , Iron-deficient Women
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose clinical trial evaluate impact low-dose iron dietary supplement marker iron status among sample premenopausal woman iron-deficient without anemia . This study also assess incidence mild adverse event ( constipation , nausea , etc . ) relatively common counter iron dietary supplement investigator hypothesize reduce lower-dose formulation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Premenopausal 2 . Iron deficient without anemia ( serum ferritin concentration < 20 ug/L hemoglobin concentration > 120 g/L ) 3 . Agree continue current diet dietary supplement 4 . Able understand write English 5 . Voluntarily consent study understand nature purpose include potential risk side effect 1 . Daily supplementation another iron supplement ( multivitamin ) currently within past 2 week 2 . Pregnant breastfeeding female 3 . History alcohol , drug , medication abuse 4 . Known allergy substance study product 5 . Donated blood past month plan time 8week trial 6 . Current diagnosis inflammatory bowel disease ( Crohn 's Ulcerative Colitis ) 7 . Taking medication interfere absorption iron 8 . Current tobacco smoker
